strapiPost.title: New Crumbl Cookies Opens in Rogers and Eyes Fayetteville
strapiPost.content:
The moment some of you Rogers residents have been waiting for has arrived! A new Crumbl Cookies has opened its doors in Rogers and is baking some of the freshest cookies for you to enjoy!

  • Cookie selection: The new location is opening up this month off S Pleasant Crossing Blvd in Rogers and according to the Fayetteville Flyer, Fayetteville will receive a franchise shortly thereafter. Crumbl is known for changing its menu every week to feature six different cookies for customers to try.
  • History snippet: Crumbl Cookies started in 2017 in Utah and now there are over 300 bakeries around the country, making it the fastest-growing cookie company in the nation. The family-owned business has a mission to bring families and friends together over the worldâ€™s best pink box of cookies. 

Learn more HERE.
